advancement.eggstra.crack_golden_egg.des: Throw and Crack a Golden Egg to find out what hides inside it
advancement.eggstra.eat_golden_cake.desc: Eat 5 slices of Golden Cake, then rush to the bathroom
advancement.eggstra.hit_chicken_with_gol: Hit a Chicken with Golden Egg. Was it worth it?
advancement.eggstra.obtain_golden_egg.de: Find a Golden Egg, and care not to drop it as it might hurt someone
advancement.eggstra.obtain_notch_apple_f: Find an Enchanted Golden Apple inside of a Golden Egg
advancement.eggstra.play_goldcore_in_man: Play the GoldCore music disc in a mangrove swamp
advancement.eggstra.root.title: Which came first?
advancement.eggstra.root.desc: Find an Egg, and contemplate its existence
